body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarMart Support. This is Jeffrey Thompson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, Jeffrey. My name is Shirley Bell.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Shirley. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a question regarding returns.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Sure, I'd be happy to help. Can you please provide me with your phone number and home address for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My phone number is nine eight seven six five four three two one zero and my address is one two three Main Street.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for confirming that, Shirley. Is there anything else you'd like to share with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Shirley. Thank you for reaching out. Have a great day!
